HP would only say that it continually looks to bring new insight and perspective to the company. The company's revelation came the same day that another technology heavyweight, Google Inc. , disclosed a surprise reshuffling of its own: CEO Eric Schmidt is relinquishing the job to Google Inc. co-founder Larry Page
